title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 184.4 - Additional criteria for appointments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 184.4 - Additional criteria for appointments

State Regulations
(a) The Class II
Wildlife Rehabilitator may be assisted by and provide training to one or more
assistant wildlife rehabilitators upon approval by the department of an outline
of training methods and procedures to assure control over the activities of
appointed assistant wildlife rehabilitators, and the Class II Wildlife

Rehabilitator shall be responsible for the proper performance of duties of all
assistant wildlife rehabilitators under their supervision. (b) A Class II Wildlife Rehabilitator may
nominate an assistant wildlife rehabilitator who was trained by and previously
assisted another Class II Wildlife Rehabilitator. In such case it shall be at
the discretion of this Class II Wildlife Rehabilitator whether or not to
require further training. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6

184.4

New

York State Register September 14, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 37, eff. 9/14/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
